title: Part-Time VA – Canva Design + Data Entry (Growth Opportunity)
job_overview:
? Top Priorities (Your Core Tasks):
Design social media assets in Canva (flyers, carousels, quote graphics, countdowns, etc.)
Format and organize content folders in Google Drive
Enter and update data in Google Sheets or CRM
Repurpose content into templates (ex: resizing IG post for LinkedIn)

? Bonus Responsibilities (Optional / Growth Tasks):
Schedule posts in Planoly or similar tools
Light research and admin support
Join Zoom/Google Meet sessions to take notes or moderate (as needed)
Help organize digital launch campaigns and materials
(We’ll support you if you’re new to any of these!)

???? You’re a Great Fit If You:
Have strong English (written and spoken)
Can work independently but aren’t afraid to ask questions
Are confident in Canva (must show samples!)
Can follow SOPs and are open to training
Want to grow with a mission-driven brand that supports creativity, wellness, and community

???? Compensation & Schedule:
$3.00–$3.50 USD/hour, paid weekly via Wise
10–20 hours/week (flexible schedule, with some overlap in EST)
$50 bonus at 30-day review if tasks are completed successfully
Raise and growth opportunities available after 90 days
